cleaned_text: (C & S ) Pathway for Young People in the secure estate YOT to instigate release preparation meeting ...to consider young person's resettlement plan Home LA undertake C&S Needs Assessment C&S Plan - including signposting to IAA and preventative services available in community Information, Advice and Assistance Service in secure estate Preventative services in community Release Preparation meeting - should consider accommodation, C&S needs & health needs -YOT to make referrals as appropriate If C&S Plan is developed... Home LA to work with young person to deliver C&S services contained within C&S Plan Health staff to undertake a health needs assessment LA Housing to undertake a housing assessment S66/73 Housing (Wales) Act Post release review by YOT... From pre -release planning to post -release Start top left and follow pathway clockwise... See National Homelessness Pathway - LAs to consider joint assessment with C & S assessment. Key: Youth Offending Team (YOT) Health Secure estate Local authority Social Services Local authority Housing If eligible , develop C&S plan and share with young person and key partner agencies If C&S plan already existed consider re - assessment If not eligible, signpost to Information, Advice and Assistance Service (IAA) and Preventative Services
